title: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems
description: When I launch the Help view, I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame or the content frame) before it starts working. This should be fixed so that the Help view can be immediately navigated via the keyboard.
OB: Currently, the Help view does not start in a way that allows for immediate keyboard navigation.
EB: The Help view should start in a way that can be immediately navigated via the keyboard.
SR: When the Help view is launched, the Tab key does not function as expected.
